# Itty Bitty

This is one of the strangest ideas I've ever seen in a while. Nicholas Jitkoff has made a tool called [itty.bitty](https://itty.bitty.site/) that creates websites with all of the assets being contained within their own link. You can create a website without any HTML or CSS resources at all because itâ€™s all been encoded into the URL itself.

For example: take a look at this humongous link:

`https://itty.bitty.site/#`

And a [clickable version](https://itty.bitty.site/#) If you like

This link contains all of the HTML and CSS to be contained in the site. It's an awesome idea, so why don't you make your own [itty bitty site](itty.bitty.site)?
